description: Doesn't work... Flashes a terminal box for a split second and then nothing...
Flashes terminal for second and does nothing.

My Apologies if I offend anyone.
 This sort of "Software" should be removed from Ubuntu Software. Have tried to make use, on an awesome Desktop, and a Laptop, many times, with no result at all! 
Straight up0, flashes Terminal a few times in 1 second.... That is it! Nothing else happens. Fans dont run any faster. nor do they slow down. No actual control of the Fans at all! 
Just trying to configure my Fans. Trying to keep things Kool, yet no waste battery, just for the fan to be "On", when it is not needed. 
Take it from me...do not use this! Does nothing with the fans on a laptop... Or a desktop...

flashes a terminal for a sec and nothing happens
laptop : acer predator helios 300 [2019 model]
Certes je n'est pas de grande connaissance mais ce paquet ne semble pas fonctionner.
Des que son lancement sera possible, ce sera un plaisir de vous en donner un avis concret. Merci pour vos efforts en son développement a venir.
summary: Évaluation pour le moment négative: lancement logiciel impossible
